alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:48AM EST until February 21 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR ELEVATIONS GREATER THAN 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches for elevations greater than 1500 feet. * WHERE...Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates could approach 1 inch per hour at times late this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
